ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] mid level armour questions
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to go upstairs in Freeport bard guild to find the one guy who bothered to learn his Instill Doubt skill well enough to train others. ;p Then the next
ygData.messageBody:
You need to go upstairs in Freeport bard guild to find the one guy who
bothered to learn his Instill Doubt skill well enough to train others. ;p

Then the next time you are in wolf-form, you can annoy your party with ID.
As a doggy, it triggers the attack animation. Doubly annoying to anyone who
has game sounds turned on.

Sylly

----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 21, 2000 11:53 AM
Subject: [eqbards] mid level armour questions


> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> I just made 26 and couldn't train Instil Doubt in Freeport (though it was
> late I was tired and I think I didn't check the other guildmaster), no
> biggie, I need to go to Kelethin to buy Screech anyway.
